UI

Class WorkerWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • UI.WorkerWrapper

  • public class WorkerWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Object only used by DefineTeamUI to provide GlazedLists with details of the number of tasks allocated to a worker for the project set on this object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorkerWrapper(Project project, Worker worker)

      Provides the number of projects that this work is currently assigned to

      Provides the workers role as a text description

      Provides access to the wrapped worker
